author: Kate Krader, Misyrlena Egkolfopoulou, Emma Kinery
title: $2 Trillion Virus Bill Leaves 'Gaping Holes' For Restaurant Industry
description: The stimulus signed by President Trump offers support for workers and loans for small businesses—but not enough solace for restaurants that have already closed or laid off employees.
content:
The view inside Junior’s Cheesecake in Brooklyn, NY on March 16.
